original_text: Abigail quickly got on a donkey and, attended by her five female servants, went with David’s messengers and became his wife.
korean_text: 아비가일이 급히 일어나서 나귀를 타고 그를 뒤따르는 처녀 다섯과 함께 다윗의 전령들을 따라가서 다윗의 아내가 되니라

sentences.original_text: Abigail quickly got on a donkey
and, attended by her five female servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 다섯 여종에게 시중을 받으며
